Description.Text: The air-conditioned hotel includes a foyer with 24-hour reception, a hotel safe and lift access. Meeting rooms, room and laundry services and parking facilities are also available for all hotel guests. Try the culinary delicacies in the Corrals restaurant! Let our successful head chef and his team treat you to the finest and freshest local products. The Kruger bar is the place to meet for all - whether here on business or for pleasure. The bar serves breakfast and a midday buffet, and guests may order here daily from a comprehensive menu.
